tv.generator-info-name: WebGrab+Plus/w MDB & REX Postprocess -- version V5.3.0.0 -- Jan van Straaten

programme.title: JAG: Into the Breach
programme.desc: Harm and Mac agree to help guide young student "attorneys" at Iron Forge Naval Academy, a prep school for the US Naval Academy, as they conduct a mock trial.(n)

programme.title: JAG: Boomerang (Part 2)
programme.desc: Hostilities between Harm and Brumby escalate both in and out of the courtroom and it takes Chegwidden, with Brumby's CO's approval to get them to deal with their anger.(n)

programme.title: JAG: People V. Gunny
programme.desc: Gunny is charged with gay-bashing following an off duty altercation outside a gay bar.(n)

programme.title: JAG: The Bridge At Kang So Ri
programme.sub-title: The Bridge At Kang So Ri
programme.desc: Harm and Mac board a plane bound for Korea to investigate charges that GI's shot and killed civilians during the Korean War.(n)

programme.title: JAG: Drop Zone
programme.desc: Mac is prosecuting a SEAL jumpmaster charged with causing the death of one of his men during a parachute insertion exercise.(n)

programme.title: Scorpion: Nerd, Wind and Fire
programme.desc: On Valentine's Day, Team Scorpion must set aside their romantic plans to help a doctor and pilot trapped inside a helicopter that crashed atop a skyscraper.(n)

programme.title: Scorpion: Dumbster Fire
programme.desc: The geniuses of Team Scorpion turn into knuckleheads and Paige must simplify the science for them, when their mental faculties are impaired during a job to prevent the creation of a black hole.(n)

programme.title: Scorpion: Dork Day Afternoon
programme.desc: Team Scorpion inadvertently crashes a bank robbery in progress and is taken hostage. Also, Sylvester's feelings for Florence grow.(n)

programme.title: Scorpion: Gator Done
programme.desc: Team Scorpion heads to the bayou to track down a cagey alligator in order to stop a deadly mosquito-borne virus, and Paige teaches Walter the concept of the 'white lie.'.(n)

programme.title: Scorpion: Foul Balls
programme.desc: Team Scorpion must use their high IQs to win a softball game when the homeland director challenges, with all of their future government contracts on the line.(n)

programme.title: Scorpion: Kenny and the Jet
programme.desc: Paige's maternal side goes into high gear when Team Scorpion must save an unconscious, a hypothermic boy stuck in the wheel well of their airborne airplane.(n)

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Blink
programme.desc: In the aftermath of the night’s traumatic events, Andy and Dov try to pull themselves together at an all-night diner, but are caught off-duty and off-guard in a volatile diner hold-up.(n)

programme.title: Rookie Blue: All by Her Selfie
programme.desc: Oliver gets promoted and Andy is tasked with training 15 Division’s newest rookie, Duncan Moore. But when Andy and Duncan respond to a messy homicide at a pawnshop, it’s clear this rookie is going to give Andy the challenge of a lifetime.(n)

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Heart Breakers, Money Makers
programme.desc: When Andy and Nick’s seizure at an illegal gambling house leads to a suspicious confession, Andy recruits Sam to help figure out who’s lying, why, and where the money is, before anyone gets hurt.(n)

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Wanting
programme.desc: When a tenement-building shooting leads to the discovery of an executed gang leader, 15 Division must race to find the killer before a gang war breaks out.(n)

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Going Under
programme.desc: When 15 Division goes undercover at a club-land bar that’s a possible hub for illegal handguns, Chris’s erratic behavior and concern for a specific drug dealer make Dov suspicious.(n)

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Two Truths and a Lie
programme.desc: As the officers of 15 Division try to hunt down the killer of Brian Gowdy – Andy and Sam go on the road to interview a list of inmates at Millburn Penitentiary.(n)

programme.title: Ancient High House
programme.desc: The team are followed around this ancient house said to be the haunt of many long dead spirits. The team are soon put to the test as Gregg feels something is playing with him.(n)

programme.title: Ashwell Prison As Live Pt 1
programme.desc: The Most Haunted tackle the deserted sprawling Ashwell Prison in this As-Live uncut episode. Feeling isolated and separated the team find themselves confronted by something in the dark.(n)

programme.title: Ashwell Prison As Live Pt 2
programme.desc: The Most Haunted team continue to film at Ashwell Prison after being pushed to the limits tempers fray and Yvette is stuck alone, petrified as she is stalked by an unseen force lost in the corridors of the prison and the team scramble to save her.(n)

programme.title: Bate Hall Pt 1
programme.desc: Yvette and the MH team travel to the oldest pub in Macclesfield, famous for ghost stories and strange occurrences. Whatever is there makes itself known quickly and violently.(n)

programme.title: Bate Hall Pt 2
programme.desc: The Most Haunted team continue to investigate Macclesfield’s oldest pub and are soon under fire from poltergeist activity. Glen’s scepticism is put fully to the test.(n)

programme.title: Ghost Hunters
programme.desc: Despite mysterious and unnerving warnings from locals, the Ghost Hunters face their fears and stay on mission: to help people confront terrifying paranormal encounters that have shaken them to their core.(n)

programme.title: Ghost Hunters
programme.desc: Despite mysterious and unnerving warnings from locals, the Ghost Hunters face their fears and stay on mission: to help people confront terrifying paranormal encounters that have shaken them to their core.(n)

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Public Poltergeist Number 1
programme.desc: The historic Old Lake County Jail was once considered to be inescapable... until notorious gangster John Dillinger, escaped from it in 1934. Over 80 years later, aggressive prisoners are breaking free as sealed areas.(n)

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Dudley Dead Wright
programme.desc: A homeowner's property backs up to land where a cursed 1740's village once stood.Could evil entities have traveled from that property tothis terrified mother's homeputting her family at risk?(n)

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Christmas Spirit
programme.desc: TAPS gets into the spirit with an investigation of Bethlehem, Pennsylvania.(n)

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: The Ghost Hasn't Left the Building
programme.sub-title: The Ghost Hasn't Left the Building
programme.desc: On this episode of Ghost Hunters, Amy is back! TAPS travels to Shreveport, Louisiana to investigate the historic Shreveport Auditorium, a place famous for introducing Elvis and other rock n' rolls stars to the world.(n)

programme.title: Andromeda
programme.desc: The crew must steal a jewel that is at the center of a feud between a Drift owner and the Than. Beka falls for a security chief who was formerly a thief.(n)

programme.title: Andromeda: Pitiless As the Sun
programme.desc: Andromeda answers a distress call when a cargo ship is attacked.(n)

programme.title: Andromeda: Last Call at the Broken Hammer
programme.sub-title: Last Call at the Broken Hammer
programme.desc: The crew looks for a long-lost Commonwealth leader who has gone into hiding.(n)

programme.title: Andromeda: All Too Human
programme.desc: Dylan, Beka and Trance go with Rommie to find out about a weapon being developed on a planet that distrusts AI.(n)

programme.title: Andromeda
programme.desc: Andromeda is tasked with escorting medical ships safely through Drago-Kazov space.(n)

programme.title: Andromeda: Home Fires
programme.desc: A planet of Commonwealth survivors led by Dylan's former fiancee is invited to join the new Commonwealth, but when they vote not to join, the Magog are suspected of playing dirty.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.51
programme.desc: Young nurse sues ex-boyfriend for damages, Dodge Durango payments, motorcycle damages, and unpaid cell phone charges/Woman sues evicted friend and child for back rent, countersued for belongings left behind.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.6
programme.desc: Teen catfight leads to adult feud over truck vandalism/Teen crashes car after drunk 17-year-old allegedly permits him, sued by her father.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.203
programme.desc: A Malibu man claiming he was tired of being a “cabana boy” for his older girlfriend is sued for allegedly stealing her tools and making unauthorized charges on her credit card.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.236
programme.desc: Ex-fiancés from rehab fight publicly and clash in court over an arrest, property return, and a dog. A 19-year-old sues her mother for spending a dog bite settlement check.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.235
programme.desc: A woman sues her sister's ex for repossessing a Chevy Yukon; he alleges stolen tags. Exes argue over a bite mark and sue for car damages, a lease, and unpaid vet bills.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.82
programme.desc: Two sisters sue a family member for allegedly selling their third\t\t\t\r\nsister’s belongings at a garage sale while she was incarcerated/An allegedly unpaid loan for breast augmentation further divides a woman and her estranged daughter-in-law.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.211
programme.desc: Convicted of first-degree assault after an altercation at a bar, a man is sued by his ex-girlfriend who bailed him out of jail.\t\t\t\r\nAn alleged assault between former college dorm mates, a cycle of harassment, and a damaged computer are disputed.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.188
programme.desc: A troubled teen is at the center of a dispute between a woman and her son-in-law’s daughter over the cost of two airplane tickets to Pittsburgh.\t\t\t\r\nA woman sues her son-in-law’s granddaughter for money loaned to buy a mobile home.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.246
programme.desc: Racial slurs and violent threats emerge as a woman and her father sue a family member for incomplete home renovations. Meanwhile, friends swap cell phones, but a defective device complicates the arrangement.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.197
programme.desc: Woman sues child's father for PlayStation III balance and harassment. 'Good Samaritan' sues former friend for student loan balance.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.133
programme.desc: Woman sues ex-friend for damaging Pontiac Grand Prix she was selling; ex-friend countersues for car payments. Parents fight over sick child's medication; neighbor testifies helping administer meds.(n)

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: A challenge involving cooking five commonly served `staple' dishes. Chef Ramsay makes changes to a dining service.(n)

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: For the chefs' next challenge, Chef Ramsay pits the teams against one another, preparing authentic Chinese dishes as prominent Chinese Chef Shirley Chung is brought in to judge their finished dishes.(n)

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: With the dining room transformed into an Italian bistro, all eight chefs learn that they will participate in the beloved blind taste test challenge, gelato edition. With two tables of 12 patrons, the chefs rush to see who finishes first.(n)

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: The seven remaining chefs are called down to the dining room to discover two ice dancers performing a routine. Chef Ramsay explains ice dancing can be romantic, just as dessert can be. For their challenge they must cook an extraordinary dessert.(n)

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: In the first challenge, the final six chefs break through a case, retrieving a random ingredient they will have to cook with. The second challenge has each chef cooking with the same four ingredients. The third challenge is a surf and turf challenge.(n)

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: Twelve aspiring restaurateurs compete before chef Gordon Ramsay as he works to open a world-class restaurant in Los Angeles and discover the country's next culinary star.(n)

programme.title: Undercover Boss USA
programme.desc: Sam Taylor, the President & CEO of Oriental Trading Company, the largest retailer of party supplies in the United States, is going undercover in hopes of finding that the company’s mission of “selling fun.(n)

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: Jane Riddell, chief operating officer of GoodLife Fitness, disguises herself as a Zumba-instructor trainee, a maintenance worker and a salesperson.(n)

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: The Victorian Order of Nurses takes the pressure off hospitals by providing care for people in their own homes. Hundreds of rival companies compete for cash and customers.(n)

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: Stacey Mowbray, CEO of Canada’s largest specialty coffee company goes undercover and gets into the grind serving lattes to get an edge on customer service and revive her connection with frontline workers.(n)

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: Toronto Transit Commission (TTC) City Councillor and TTC Chair Karen Stintz goes undercover inside the country's largest mass transit system to get her hands dirty with some of the toughest and grittiest jobs.(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo starts 9pm
programme.desc: STARTS 9PM Take a ride along with Operation Repo! This docudrama series takes an in-depth look at the professional, but sometimes murky world of car repossession. Get ready for the drama!(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo starts 9pm
programme.desc: STARTS 9PM Take a ride along with Operation Repo! This docudrama series takes an in-depth look at the professional, but sometimes murky world of car repossession. Get ready for the drama!(n)

programme.desc: STARTS 9PM Take a ride along with Operation Repo! This docudrama series takes an in-depth look at the professional, but sometimes murky world of car repossession. Get ready for the drama!(n)

programme.desc: STARTS 9PM Take a ride along with Operation Repo! This docudrama series takes an in-depth look at the professional, but sometimes murky world of car repossession. Get ready for the drama!(n)

programme.desc: STARTS 9PM Take a ride along with Operation Repo! This docudrama series takes an in-depth look at the professional, but sometimes murky world of car repossession. Get ready for the drama!(n)

programme.desc: STARTS 9PM Take a ride along with Operation Repo! This docudrama series takes an in-depth look at the professional, but sometimes murky world of car repossession. Get ready for the drama!(n)

programme.desc: STARTS 9PM Take a ride along with Operation Repo! This docudrama series takes an in-depth look at the professional, but sometimes murky world of car repossession. Get ready for the drama!(n)

programme.desc: STARTS 9PM Take a ride along with Operation Repo! This docudrama series takes an in-depth look at the professional, but sometimes murky world of car repossession. Get ready for the drama!(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Goodbye Dolly
programme.desc: Audrey tries to prepare for motherhood by continuing to repair a doll that she keeps damaging. Meanwhile, Jeff questions whether the very pregnant Brenda should be dating anymore, and Adam tries to convince Jennifer that he is a manly man.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Audrey's Shower
programme.desc: Jen puts the wrong date on the invitations to Audrey's baby shower, Jeff likes Audrey's maternity clothes, and Russell gives up women.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Liz Moves In
programme.desc: Liz temporarily moves in with Jeff and Audrey. Jeff isn't happy with the new guest, but changes his mind when he discovers Liz consistently takes his side against Audrey.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Taking Names
programme.desc: Jeff and Audrey realize that the names on their baby list are also the names of women that Russell has slept with. Adam becomes a cycling enthusiast after Jennifer suggests they start riding bikes in the park.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Cats & Dogs
programme.desc: Feeling lonely after her cat dies, Liz looks for a sperm donor. When Timmy's intellect and innocence don't attract his crush, he tries his hand at playing 'big dog.' Adam rips the vintage wedding dress that Jennifer's family sent her.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Cupcake
programme.desc: Russell gets jealous when Timmy manages to outshine him at his own pick-up game. Adam and Jennifer leave pot-laced cupcakes on the kitchen counter, and an unaware Jeff eats one.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Fountain Of Youth
programme.desc: After meeting up with college friends who are no longer into partying, Jeff and Audrey set out to prove that even with a baby on the way, they can still have fun. Meanwhile, Timmy attempts to find Russell's compassionate side.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Baby Talk
programme.desc: When Audrey bonds with their unborn baby by reading her stories, a paranoid Jeff believes that she is trying to form an alliance against him. Meanwhile, Russell steals an article that Timmy wrote.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Role Play
programme.desc: Jeff promises to take Audrey to an upmarket and very popular restaurant but forgets to book a table. Determined to dine there, he hatches a plan to get in by claiming that a last-minute reservation is needed for a celebrity.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Catering
programme.desc: Brenda enlists Jeff and Audrey's help when she does the catering for an event at Columbia University. While waitressing, Audrey tries to fit in with the guests, only to discover that they are more impressed with Jeff's bartending skills.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Greed is Good
programme.desc: Today's fugitive is accused of assaulting a police officer, so Dog and the team are not taking any chances. Dog has to play on his target's greed and deploy some modern technology to set a trap for this runner.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Tears for Fears
programme.desc: Baby Lyssa wakes up in a jail cell, but ignores the ensuing media frenzy in order to befriend a woman waging a personal battle against drug addiction.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Picture This
programme.desc: A fugitive with a long criminal record has fled to Hawaii, and the bondsman on the mainland has asked Dog for help. Dog doesn't have much information to work with, but he can use the felon's desire to impress his friends to track him down.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Tag, You're It
programme.desc: To his traditional bounty hunting tools of confidential informants, canvassing, and silver-tongued subterfuge the world's greatest bounty hunter has added Facebook! A word to the wise for those on the run-post at your own peril, the Dog is watching!(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: A Family Affair
programme.desc: Dog likes to say, "The apple doesn't fall far from the tree," and this is a hunt where that is true. So will Dog be able to use one family member's troubled ways to catch another one in trouble with the law?(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Training Day
programme.desc: While the team tries to handle the bond that newcomer Alysin wrote incorrectly, sparks are flying between Beth and Duane Lee when he questions Beth's decision to go on the hunt without Dog leading the charge!(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Cutting the Apron Strings
programme.desc: Two different young men both have a bad habit of missing their court dates. Looking over their files Dog senses that they have another trait in common, both are a little too tied to their mothers.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Bass Man Standing
programme.desc: The Duck Commander team is invited to unveil a wing of the local Bass Pro shop that will feature their products.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Battle of the Brothers
programme.desc: Willie's suspicious behavior from dyeing his beard to buying a new motorcycle, makes Jase come to the conclusion that Willie is having a mid-life crisis.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Aloha, Robertsons!
programme.desc: After all their hard work, Willie decides to take the entire Robertson clan on a family vacation to Hawaii. But Willie's daily itinerary for the trip gets constantly undermined by the family's desire to participate in their own island activities.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Till Duck Do Us Part
programme.desc: Everyone comes together to plan a surprise wedding for Phil and Kay, setting up a special ceremony on their land, which the whole family attends. Si distracts Phil and Kay by taking them on a "trip down memory lane".(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: So You Think You Can Date?
programme.sub-title: So You Think You Can Date?
programme.desc: After discovering that Martin has to miss a Friday night poker game for a date, the guys (as well as their wives) take turns figuring out the best way to coach him for romance. When babysitting for Jep and Jessica turns into a rocky road.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Hot Tub Grime Machine
programme.desc: The guys realize that Godwin has never really asked them for a favor, even though they are all always helping each other out. Godwin asks them to help him get a hot tub, so they set out to help him pick one up.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: A-Jase-ent Living
programme.desc: Due to construction at Jase and Missy's house, Willie and Korie invite Jase and the kids to live with them while Missy is out of town visiting friends. Then, what begins in the duck call room as a series of "Gentlemen's Bets".(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Termite Be a Problem
programme.desc: Because of a termite problem at Duck Commander, the guys are forced to find a different location to work from - Godwin's House. But while at Godwin's house, Godwin gets a taxidermied gift from a past relative.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: John Luke After Dentist
programme.desc: John Luke and Sadie are getting some dental work done, complete with sedation, and it's up to Willie and Korie to take care of them through the process - including getting them back home safely.(n)

programme.title: Native
programme.desc: Two scientists are selected to travel across the universe to the source of a distant transmission and potential life.(n)

programme.title: Marjorie Prime
programme.desc: In 2050, 86-year-old Marjorie has a holographic companion who resembles her dead husband and is programmed to feed her the story of her life. With Lois Smith, Jon Hamm, Geena Davis.(n)

programme.title: Rise Of The Fellowship
programme.desc: What if The Lord of the Rings wasn’t just a story? What if it happened to you? Randall Dooley and his friends are outcasts at school, spending most of their time playing online games. After Randall is set up for a crime he didn’t commit.(n)

programme.title: Foster
programme.desc: A heart-warming story of family and friendship starring Academy Award Nominee Toni Collette and Ioan Gruffudd.(n)

programme.title: Knucklehead
programme.desc: After incurring a large debt with a local criminal ringleader, Eddie Sullivan creates a get-rich-quick scheme and enlists a gentle giant named Walter as his unwitting accomplice.(n)

programme.title: The Forger
programme.desc: A teenager wanders into Carmel, California, where he is soon introduced to the art-forgery community.(n)

programme.title: Jack Hunter: And The Quest For Akhenatens Tomb
programme.sub-title: And The Quest For Akhenatens Tomb
programme.desc: Jack Hunter is abducted blindfolded to a Turkish US base to be recruited by the NSA, told his mentor was killed because Albert Littmann's Russian mob employer Doridanov want the ancient Osiris-weapon.(n)

programme.title: Banana Joe: Banana Joe
programme.desc: A man is living happily on an island with his family, growing bananas. When a local mobster with an eye on man's property tries to take it from him, he must go to the town for the first time to get some help.(n)

programme.title: The Cannonball Run
programme.desc: The classic comedy with cool stars and even cooler cars! Based on a true race event, Burt Reynolds leads an all-star cast in the ultimate quest to win The Cannonball Run.(n)

programme.title: The Flight Before Christmas
programme.desc: Starring Mayim Bialik and Ryan McPartlin. Two strangers offer to share the last remaining room at a bed-and-breakfast when a snowstorm strands their flight in Montana on Christmas Eve.(n)

programme.title: A Doggone For christmas
programme.desc: The CIA discovers a puppy with amazing abilities, they force it to become a secret weapon. When the pint-sized Jack Russell is freed from government clutches, he ends up in the loving arms of two brothers just a week before Christmas.(n)

programme.title: A Beauty And The Beast Christmas
programme.desc: Social Media influencer Ginger Holiday is convinced by her agent to fake a romance with viral bad boy Beau Bradley to gain more followers. Initially they can't stand each other but the feelings they had to fake might just be turning into something real.(n)

programme.title: House On The Hill
programme.desc: After years in a mental hospital, Megan goes home to visit her brother. But once she arrives her brother has vanished and no one in town remembers him ever existing. Is Megan losing her mind, or is something more diabolical at work?(n)

programme.title: Like Mother, Like Daughter
programme.desc: Starring Dani Kind and Michelle Stafford. When Dawna Williams' college-aged daughter goes missing, she investigates her daughter's disappearance herself, unaware that her biggest supporter is also the man who may have murdered her child.(n)

programme.title: Mary Higgins Clark
programme.sub-title: Mary Higgins Clark: Haven't We Met Before
programme.desc: After attempting to murder a woman he's convinced tried to kill him in a past life, a man is committed to a hospital for the criminally insane, but a suspicious District Attorney is convinced that the man has killed before.(n)

programme.title: Churchill
programme.desc: British Prime Minister Winston Churchill clashes with his political opponents as D-Day nears in June 1944. Clementine, his devoted wife, tries to prevent his physical, mental and spiritual collapse while inspiring him to achieve greatness.(n)

programme.title: Summerland
programme.desc: A reclusive Englishwoman opens her heart to a young evacuee as World War II rages across the channel.(n)

programme.title: Megan Leavey
programme.desc: Young Marine Cpl. Megan Leavey starts to identify with Rex, a particularly aggressive combat dog that she trains. Together, they complete more than 100 missions until an improvised explosive device injures both, putting their fates in jeopardy.(n)

programme.title: Death Valley Days: Alias James Stuart
programme.desc: A man's resemblance to a killer lands him in jail and facing a murder charge.(n)

programme.title: Death Valley Days: Storm Over Truckee
programme.desc: A raging snowstorm holds more than one danger for Maggie and her father: they must take refuge with murderers.(n)

programme.title: Death Valley Days: The Treasure of Elk Creek Canyon
programme.sub-title: The Treasure of Elk Creek Canyon
programme.desc: Stagecoach driver Abe Williamson hunts down two outlaws who robbed his stagecoach.(n)

programme.title: Death Valley Days: A Bullet for the D.A.
programme.desc: Ex-outlaw Belle Starr goes after the D.A. who ridiculed her illiterate husband.(n)

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: When a wealthy rancher is killed, Mark suggests that they seek the aid of a mind reader to identify the murderer.(n)

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: After Lucas kills a mountain man in a brawl, his father arrives in North Fork to break his other boys out of jail and take revenge on Lucas and Marshall Torrance.(n)

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Newly arrived gunslinger Al Walker throws a mammoth party at the saloon, keeping acting Marshall Ben Waller busy until Lucas is forced to intervene.(n)

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: After Lucas accuses a newspaper writer's misleading articles of causing an innocent man's death, the writer begins writing articles about Lucas.(n)

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Gavin and Ezra Martin think that Lucas killed their son Clemmie while taking part in a train robbery and Lucas refuses to tell them what really happened.(n)

programme.title: Moondance Alexander
programme.desc: When a Pinto pony named Checkers leaps into her life, Moondance is convinced that Checkers has champion potential and enters him in the Bow Valley Classic. She soon learns that only perseverance lands you in the winner's circle.(n)

programme.title: The Lost Medallion
programme.desc: Billy Stone and Allie, two 13-year-old friends, uncover a long-lost medallion and accidentally wish themselves back in time. In order for Billy to save Allie's life, he must give up the medallion to the evil warlord, Cobra, who rules the island.(n)

programme.title: Time Toys
programme.desc: A group of kids stumble upon a chest full of toys from the future. The discovery takes them on an adventure using their new-found toys to save their neighbourhood and the world from a maniacal madman. A fun, futuristic adventure for all the family.(n)

programme.title: And So It Goes
programme.desc: Oren, grieving his wife, shuns kindness. Leah, mourning her husband, pours her soul into singing. Oren's son leaves Sarah with him. Despite their loneliness, Sarah may spark a transformation, turning their home into a Little Shangri-La.(n)

programme.title: Accidentally Engaged
programme.desc: Famous actor Chas Hunter and aspiring actress Clarissa Byers agree to fake an engagement to improve both their reputations. However, playing pretend starts to feel all too real as the two start to fall for one another.(n)

programme.title: Killers
programme.desc: Spencer is just your average, undercover super-assassin. When he meets Jen, he finds true love. But a picture-perfect marriage won't save Spencer from becoming a target himself. Now Spencer and Jen are on the run for their lives.(n)

programme.title: The Decoy Bride
programme.desc: A heart-warming romantic comedy about an ordinary girl who is hired to be the decoy for the most famous bride in the world.(n)

programme.title: Straight on Till Morning
programme.desc: A timid, withdrawn woman from Liverpool moves to London and finally meets a man who she believes to be the love of her life, but unbeknownst to her, that man is a vicious serial killer.(n)

programme.title: Find The Lady
programme.desc: During New Year's Eve, a young model spends the day searching for her grandmother, who has suspiciously gone missing.(n)

programme.title: Circus of Fear
programme.desc: Scotland Yard detectives find intrigue and murder at a new circus attraction.(n)

programme.title: Death Line
programme.desc: The discovery of a dying man by two students at Russell Square tube station triggers a hunt for cannibals preying on passengers.(n)

programme.title: Relic Hunter: Warlock of Nu Theta Phi
programme.desc: When Sydney's student Meg's roommate finds a witch's amulet, it hospitalizes Meg. Meg's boyfriend's fraternity brother races to get the amulet. What is he up to?(n)

programme.title: Relic Hunter: Fire in the Sky
programme.desc: While Sydney is lecturing about the Native Americans who faced a mysterious cataclysm 600 years earlier, a native brings her a relic from that era. What is its secret?(n)

programme.title: Relic Hunter: Hunting with the Enemy
programme.desc: An urn commissioned in a Cambodian monastery by the Chinese emperor for the remains of Confucius is about to be destroyed by systematic bombing of a whole province.(n)

programme.title: Relic Hunter: Under the Ice
programme.desc: Despite terrible weather, Sidney drags Nigel along to an Arctic base where an ancient Indian mummy has been found, who turns out to be an Anasazi.(n)

programme.title: Black Hole High: Technology
programme.desc: An old box of Pearadyne Lab computer chips leads Marshall into a moneymaking scheme, but he's accused of cheating. Also the students of Blake Holsey go cellphone and texting crazy.(n)

programme.title: Black Hole High: Equation
programme.desc: The Academic Olympics team trains under Capt. Corrine (who is obsessed with winning). Josie, Lucas, Marshall, and Vaughn must figure out why they are doing things they normally couldn't or shouldn't be doing.(n)

programme.title: The Lost World: Dead Man's Hill
programme.desc: Roxton stumbles into a bizarre Wild West alternate reality when he finds his name on a tombstone. Roxton meets the other explorers' pioneer-town personas.(n)

programme.title: The Lost World: Hollow Victory
programme.desc: Challenger experiments with a new fuel source in the hot-air balloon, and takes the other explorers along for a test ride. However, a storm drags the balloon into a dangerous underground world.(n)

programme.title: Mutant X
programme.desc: Shalimar reluctantly agrees to contact her estranged father when the team learns his company is involved in genetic testing and manipulation.(n)

programme.title: Mutant X
programme.desc: In the exciting season opener, the surviving members of Mutant X emerge from a deadly explosion to meet Lexa, who makes them begin to question fundamental assumptions about their world.(n)

programme.title: Mutant X
programme.desc: The Mutant X team must stop the auction of a highly lethal substance that a number of notorious international terrorists are vying to acquire.(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Everything's Bigger in Texas
programme.desc: Winchester 1886 rifle invented to kill buffalo; collection of 1950s electric Slot Cars.(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Reel Money
programme.desc: 1970's-era Fighting Chair used for big-game fishing; military MILES "laser tag" training system.(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Mr. Haff Goes to Washington
programme.desc: Ton and Allen invade the Nation's capital, but meet strong resistance from local bidders. The guys uncover a Civil War era black powder revolver and a stash of South African gold coins!(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: The Chi-Town Showdown
programme.desc: Metal Victorian-era burial casket; 1870s glass fire extinguisher grenades; a mechanical 1896 handcrafted Chicago fire station alarm box.(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Animal Instincts
programme.desc: The first pump action shotgun - a Winchester Model 1897; a hunter's collection of prize big game, full-body taxidermy.(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Allen's Ruff Day
programme.desc: Ton and Allen head to an auction in Ton's hometown and end up battling with a big-mouthed buyer. They discover a pair of tranquilizer dart guns and also end up fighting with a K9!(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Choo-Choo, Cha-Ching!
programme.desc: Ton and Allen get a surprise second chance after nearly getting shut out in the small town of Palmer. They uncover a motorized railroad maintenance car from the 1960's and a pre-WWI Japanese semi-automatic pistol.(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Top Gun Ton
programme.desc: Scale RC Viper FanJet aircraft with a potent jet engine; 1920s Gundlach Korona large format field camera used for photography expeditions. Ton pilots a plane, but crashes and burns.(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Ton's Got a Gun
programme.desc: In the affluent area of Mission Hills, CA, Allen and Ton pick up an estate unit that contains a minibike, a Depression-era slot machine and an 1871 Colt revolver.(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Half Pipe Dreams
programme.desc: 1970s Z-Flex Jimmy Plumer Poolrider skateboard with artwork by Doug Smith; Kevlar bulletproof vest, ballistic facemask and a helmet used by S.W.A.T. teams; a pair of 1990s racing pocket bikes capable of going 80 mph.(n)
